9177e5ac94f038749e8d4eb526a65461e0f6df4c: Judge finds Heather Mills claims of riches in exaggerated and rejects her portrayal as Paul McCartney business partner McCartney was generous giving Mills substantial capital and gifts but did not give her valuable paintings McCartney fortune estimated at million not the million claimed by Mills her expectation to live like McCartney deemed fanciful Mills claim of zero earning capacity dismissed judge believes her career was advanced not hindered by McCartney
f12e4bbb07211de7d43b4e331dc73404aa804562: Sarah Knox Taylor Davis, offspring of President Zachary Taylor, died of malaria three quarters after marrying Jefferson Davis. Elizabeth Harrison Walker, progeny of President Benjamin Harrison, became a lawyer and economic expert appearing on wireless and TV. Margaret Woodrow Wilson, child of President Woodrow Wilson, advocated for democracy and resided in an Indian ashram until her death. Elizabeth Ann Christian Blaesing, daughter of President Warren Harding, lived a quiet life despite the scandal of her birth.
